title: Google is offering electric scooters to ease US employees’ return to the office
content:
As the COVID-19 pandemic starts to settle down in some parts of the globe, Google is returning its employees to in-person offices. Now, Google is offering up access to electric scooters for its employees to assist in daily commutes.

more…

The post Google is offering electric scooters to ease US employees’ return to the office appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: To ease the transition back into the office, Google is offering up free access to electric scooters for its US employees.
